alert.note: Alert for Kootenai; Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 09 at 4:14AM MDT until June 11 at 5:34AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of North Idaho, including the following counties, Benewah, Bonner, Boundary, Kootenai and Latah. Portions of Washington, including the following counties, Ferry, Okanogan, Pend Oreille and Stevens. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A incoming system could produce heavy rain showers through the morning. Burn scars in steep terrain will be susceptable to flash flooding. Urban and rural areas may experience flooding in low lying areas and roadways. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
